{{ task.id }} {{ task.name }} {{ task.description }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Task } from "../model/task"; import { TaskService } from '../task.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task', templateUrl: './task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task.component.css'] }) export class TaskComponent { tasks: Task[] = []; constructor(private taskService: TaskService) {} ngOnInit() { this.getTasks(); } getTasks(): void { this.tasks = this.taskService.getTasks(); } addTask(name: string, description: string, dateString: string): void { name = name.trim(); description = description.trim(); if (!name || !description || !dateString) { return; } const dateParts = dateString.split('/'); const date = new Date(parseInt(dateParts[2]), parseInt(dateParts[1]) - 1, parseInt(dateParts[0])); this.taskService.addTask(name, description, date); this.getTasks(); } deleteTask(task: Task): void { this.tasks = this.tasks.filter(u => u !== task); this.taskService.deleteTask(task); } }
